flavorText: "You have a family. Mine died at Sea Gate. You go to yours, and I'll go to mine."

foreignData.flavorText: „Du hast eine Familie. Meine starb in Seetor. Gehe du zu deiner, ich gehe zu meiner."
foreignData.name: Verwegene Kohorte
foreignData.text: Die Verwegene Kohorte greift in jedem Kampf an, falls möglich, es sei denn, du kontrollierst einen anderen Verbündeten.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tú tienes familia, la mía murió en Portal Marino. Vuelve con la tuya y yo me iré con la mía".
foreignData.name: Cohorte temeraria
foreignData.text: La Cohorte temeraria ataca cada combate si puede a menos que controles otro Aliado.

foreignData.flavorText: « Tu as une famille. La mienne est morte à Porte des Mers. Rejoins ta famille, je rejoindrai la mienne. »
foreignData.name: Cohorte téméraire
foreignData.text: La Cohorte téméraire attaque à chaque combat si possible à moins que vous ne contrôliez un autre allié.
foreignData.type: Créature : humain et guerrier et allié

foreignData.flavorText: "Tu hai una famiglia. La mia è morta a Portale Marino. Vai dalla tua, io raggiungerò la mia."
foreignData.name: Coorte Temeraria
foreignData.text: La Coorte Temeraria attacca in ogni combattimento se può farlo, a meno che tu non controlli un altro Alleato.

foreignData.flavorText: 「お前には家族がいるだろう。俺の家族は海門で死んだ。お前は家族のところに行け。俺も家族のところに行く。」
foreignData.name: 命知らずの群勢
foreignData.text: あなたが他の同盟者をコントロールしていないかぎり、命知らずの群勢は可能なら各戦闘で攻撃する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・戦士・同盟者

foreignData.flavorText: "당신에게는 가족이 있어. 내 가족은 바다 관문에서 모두 죽어 버렸지. 당신은 당신이 갈 길을 가. 난 내 길을 갈 테니."
foreignData.name: 무모한 무리
foreignData.text: 당신이 다른 동맹을 조종하지 않는 한, 무모한 무리는 가능하면 매 전투마다 공격한다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Você tem família. A minha morreu no Portão Marinho. Você vai para a sua e eu vou para a minha."
foreignData.name: Coorte Temerária
foreignData.text: Coorte Temerária ataca a cada combate se estiver apta a menos que você controle outro Aliado.

foreignData.flavorText: «У тебя есть семья. А моя погибла в Мореграде. Ты вернешься к своей семье, а я — к своей».
foreignData.name: Безрассудная Ватага
foreignData.text: Безрассудная Ватага атакует в каждом бою, если может, если только под вашим контролем нет другого Союзника.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你还有家人。而我的家人已经死在海户。你去找你的吧，我也会去找我的。」
foreignData.name: 鲁莽助拳人
foreignData.text: 除非你操控另一个伙伴，否则鲁莽助拳人每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 「你還有家人，而我的家人已經死在海戶。你去找你的吧，我也會去找我的。」
foreignData.name: 魯莽助拳人
foreignData.text: 除非你操控另一個伙伴，否則魯莽助拳人每次戰鬥若能攻擊，則必須攻擊。

name: Reckless Cohort
originalText: Reckless Cohort attacks each combat if able unless you control another Ally.

rulings.text: Reckless Cohort can attack if you control another Ally. It just isn’t forced to.
Reckless Cohort checks whether you control another Ally as attacking creatures are declared. At that time, if you don’t, Reckless Cohort attacks if able.

If, during its controller’s declare attackers step, that player doesn’t control another Ally but Reckless Cohort is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or hasn’t been under that player’s control continuously since the turn began (and doesn’t have haste), then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having Reckless Cohort attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost. If they don’t, Reckless Cohort doesn’t have to attack.

text: Reckless Cohort attacks each combat if able unless you control another Ally.
